mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SECURE_DATA_VERSION ( ID, SDBOX_ID, PATH, ENCRYPTED_BLOB, ACTION, ORIGINAL_CREATED_BY, ORIGINAL_CREATED_TS, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TS ) VALUES ( #{record.id}, #{record.sdboxId}, #{record.path}, #{record.encryptedBlob}, #{record.action}, #{record.originalCreatedBy}, #{record.originalCreatedTs}, #{record.createdBy}, #{record.createdTs} )
mapper.select: SELECT ID, SDBOX_ID, PATH, ENCRYPTED_BLOB, ACTION, ORIGINAL_CREATED_BY, ORIGINAL_CREATED_TS, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TS From SECURE_DATA_VERSION WHERE PATH = #{path}
SELECT ID, SDBOX_ID, PATH, ACTION, ENCRYPTED_BLOB, ORIGINAL_CREATED_BY, ORIGINAL_CREATED_TS, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TS From SECURE_DATA_VERSION WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT DISTINCT PATH From SECURE_DATA_VERSION WHERE PATH LIKE '${partialPath}%';
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SECURE_DATA_VERSION WHERE PATH LIKE '${partialPath}%';
